sourcesContent:
<script>
	import history from "./components/history.vue";
	import mouse from "./components/mouse.vue";
	import general from "./components/general.vue";
	import div1 from "./components/Div1.vue";
	import div3 from "./components/Div3.vue";
	import compare from "./components/compare.vue";

	export default {
		name: "App",
		components: {
			history,
			mouse,
			general,
			div1,
			div3,
			compare
		},
		mounted() {
			this.getData();
		},
		methods: {
			getData() {
				// 这里保留 API 调用，但要确保 api.get() 已经定义
				api.get("data", { papername: "rmap1" }, data => {
					Data = data;
					store.state.loaddata = Math.random();
				});
			}
		}
	};
</script>

<template>
	<general></general>
	<div1></div1>
	<div3></div3>
	<compare></compare>
</template>

<style scoped></style>
